ingredients.ingredient: 1 (10 ounce) can refrigerated crescent roll dough

cookingTips: Soften cream cheese before mixing for easier blending with crab
Don't overfill croissants or filling will leak during baking
Brush with egg wash or melted butter before baking for golden color
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Emphasize simple, quick assembly with quality ingredients. Show how to fill and seal the croissants properly to keep filling contained during baking.
